rules.natural: Provided that the security system is operational, if the smart lighting is connected to the network, then the smart lighting functions.
If facial recognition is active, then the security system is operational.
Facial recognition is active, or RFID scanners are active.
Under the condition that RFID scanners are active, the security system is operational.
When meeting room A is scheduled, the work environment is optimal.
Either meeting room A is scheduled, or the conference room is booked.
Whenever the projector is available, the work environment is optimal.
Under the condition that the presentation equipment is reserved, the projector is available.
Either the conference booking is cancelled, or if the conference room is booked, then the presentation equipment is reserved.
If a standing desk is assigned to employee 1, then the work environment is optimal.
A standing desk is assigned to employee 1, or an ergonomic chair is assigned to employee 1.
Under the condition that an ergonomic chair is assigned to employee 1, the workstation is configured for employee 1.
If the workstation is configured for employee 1, then the keyboard is connected to the workstation.
Under the condition that the monitor is connected to the workstation, the work environment is optimal.
If the keyboard is connected to the workstation, then the monitor is also connected to the workstation.
In the event that the smart thermostat is repaired, it was damaged.
Provided that the smart lighting is calibrated, it is functioning.
If the smart lighting's firmware is updated, then the smart lighting is calibrated.
When access permissions are conflicting, the access level is authorized.
Under the condition that a security breach is detected, if access permissions are conflicting, then the access level is not authorized.
Either a security breach is detected, or unauthorized access is suspected.
Provided that management has approved the IoT upgrade, the IoT upgrade is implemented.
Either management has approved the IoT upgrade, or management has rejected the IoT upgrade.
Either the permission conflict is resolved, or if unauthorized access is suspected, then when access permissions are conflicting, the access level is not authorized.
Whenever the cooling system is triggered, it has failed.
A temperature spike is detected, or environmental sensors are monitored.
Under the condition that environmental sensors are monitored, either backup cooling is activated, or the cooling system has not failed.
If the maintenance protocol is initiated, then the system check is completed.
In the event that management has rejected the IoT upgrade, the smart thermostat is not malfunctioning.
If the security incident is investigated, then the security event is logged.
Under the condition that the IoT upgrade is implemented, the smart thermostat is not malfunctioning.
Provided that the smart lighting is functioning, if the work environment is not optimal, then the server room is overheating.
Either the smart lighting is connected to the network, or it is disconnected from the network.
Provided that the smart lighting is disconnected from the network, it is functioning.
If it is not the case that deploying a smart thermostat in office A leads to an optimal work environment, then the smart thermostat is malfunctioning.
Under the condition that management approving the IoT upgrade does not imply the smart thermostat is not malfunctioning, the smart thermostat is repaired.
Provided that detecting a temperature spike does not lead to either backup cooling being activated or the cooling system not failing, the maintenance protocol is initiated.
When it is not true that completing the system check leads to a technician being dispatched, the incident is escalated.
If the smart lighting being connected to the network does not imply its firmware is updated, then access permissions are conflicting.
If it is not the case that the security system not being operational results in the security protocol not being bypassed, then the security incident is investigated.
Provided that the work environment not being optimal does not imply the server room is overheating, the cooling system is triggered.
If the security system is not operational, then the security protocol is bypassed.
If the work environment is not optimal, then it is not the case that the server room is overheating.

(A13 ∨ A14).natural: Either meeting room A is scheduled, or the conference room is booked.

(A3 → A5).natural: Provided that management has approved the IoT upgrade, the IoT upgrade is implemented.
